channel.title: [317]Soul Leech - Any good source/client coder apply & we start SOMETHING HUGE
channel.description:
Just one good coder that meet requirements, is friendly, is very active and a good person and we can make something big.
Requirements : - Able to make webclient from 0 to 100 without mistake and everything added( Just incase mines fail ) - Able to add items/gfx/emotes/sprites - Able to add commands - Able to edit webclients Example I ask to help me adding skillcapes and he knows how to and can help big time Example I ask him to help me add PvP sets I only have models and basic ints and he can perfectly add them
Just a good coder I'm asking for we can make the nicest server and make a revolution :p
Source : Project Insanity MTP Client : MTP Client [b]Current Planned Goals :[/b] - Full Combat System - Skillcape emotes - Quickchat - PvP Armours ( Vesta,Statius,Zuriel,Morrigan - I got weapons ) - PvP Artifacts
I also code the basic things I can add things from tutorials and also can fix bugs/glitches Its just I have more experience with websites/advertising/marketing. A server needs : - Good Coder ( Thats what I search ) - Good functional website/forum ( I can make that perfect ) - Good vps/dedi ( I have lifetime :D ) - Good staff ( Me and my partner I will get will be the best ) - Earnings ( I will atleast earn 200$ from advertisements then other earnings will also come in ) When my server players grow my earnings grow also
To introduce myself I'm Cruel, I went to ICT for 2 years to learn about computer technology.
I managed to learn : - HTML - CSS - PHP - MYSQL - CURL
I also got introduced in the hacking world so I was there for a bit and learned to DDoS, Make/Spread RAT's, VPN'ing, Botnet and those things.
And also as job I'm focused to design and code websites as I'm experienced and do this for years. You maybe know soulsplit.com I was there co owner and also website designer/coder. But the owner "Pim" is the biggest idiot on the world so I decided to stop working with him and removed my efforts on that server.
What are my plans ?
I want to make a brand new server which doesn't look like others. I already have all advertisements ready and since I can script CURL I can activate my moparscape serverstatus with a CURL execution and thats why I'm 24/7 on serverstatus and on top.
Now I need a very experiencer coder that can code very-well and do things I request. This needs experience with : - Webclients - Clients - Putting models into client - Adding e.g skillcape emotes/HD Map/etc.
When I got the basics done I wanna start launching it as v1 I expect atleast 100 players and I'm sure I will archieve it. I have a good dedicated server in my room so I will be using that to first collect money. I will make money from advertisements on my website and traffic Not only the popular Google Adsense will play a role but I'm already member of huge traffic sites.
After that I can go huge and do the final steps I will spare money for sponsored on few serverstatus websites and also add more traffic to earn more. I think when I find the perfect partner that can code very-very-well then our team will be successfull. In walk of time I wanna expand server with tons of things My plan is huge and I really believe that this can work out.
[b]Fill in application form, I'm only searching one partner that can code java e.g client,server,scripts etc.[/b]
[b]Why would I pick you :[/b] [b]Will you take orders from me :[/b] [b]How many hours a day are you busy coding :[/b] [b]What coding languages do you know :[/b] [b]Experience you recently got :[/b] [b]How long do you code :[/b] [b]Do you think that you can code like everything related rsps :[/b] [b]E-mail/MSN :[/b] [b]Anything you wanna say :[/b]
Cruelity@live.nl << MSN Contact only if you wanna apply

item.title: [317]Soul Leech - Any good source/client coder apply & we start SOMETHING HUGE
item.dc:creator: @Cruelity Cruelity
item.description:
@Cruelity wrote:

Well, to succeed I need a experienced coder without him there is no succeed
And without me there is no succeed

www.cruelsfx.nl My old project it was very good allthough after we earned a good amount he took his 50% and stopped.
I’m searching for a lifetime partner <3 so we can keep earning

Read full topic

Just one good coder that meet requirements, is friendly, is very active and a good person
and we can make something big.

Requirements :

  • Able to make webclient from 0 to 100 without mistake and everything added( Just incase mines fail )

    Example I ask to help me adding skillcapes and he knows how to and can help big time
    Example I ask him to help me add PvP sets I only have models and basic ints and he can perfectly add them

Just a good coder I’m asking for we can make the nicest server and make a revolution

To introduce myself I’m Cruel, I went to ICT for 2 years to learn about computer technology.

I also got introduced in the hacking world so I was there for a bit and learned to DDoS, Make/Spread RAT’s, VPN’ing, Botnet and those things.

And also as job I’m focused to design and code websites as I’m experienced and do this for years.
You maybe know soulsplit.com I was there co owner and also website designer/coder.
But the owner “Pim” is the biggest idiot on the world so I decided to stop working with him and removed my efforts on that server.

What are my plans ?

I want to make a brand new server which doesn’t look like others.
I already have all advertisements ready and since I can script CURL I can activate my moparscape serverstatus with a CURL execution and thats why I’m 24/7 on serverstatus and on top.

When I got the basics done I wanna start launching it as v1
I expect atleast 100 players and I’m sure I will archieve it.
I have a good dedicated server in my room so I will be using that to first collect money.
I will make money from advertisements on my website and traffic
Not only the popular Google Adsense will play a role but I’m already member of huge traffic sites.

After that I can go huge and do the final steps
I will spare money for sponsored on few serverstatus websites and also
add more traffic to earn more.
I think when I find the perfect partner that can code very-very-well then our team will be successfull.
In walk of time I wanna expand server with tons of things
My plan is huge and I really believe that this can work out.
